text: Tini'i mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena satyera sathe. Tini ratake diye dinera upare cha'uni banana ara dinake cha'uni banana ratera upare, ebam surya o candrake tini basibhuta karechena, -- pratyeke'i nirdharita gatipathe dhabita hacche. Tini'i ki mahasaktisali parama ksamasila nana
